segments.text: I'm getting quite angry just observing this whole mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing completely; it's an absolute waste of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman not notice the huge puddle at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her complete obliviousness is incredibly frustrating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, climbing on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to fall and get seriously injured; it's inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to these obvious dangers?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster and chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to see so much negligence in one room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The disregard for safety and resources here is just unacceptable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe this scene is unfolding without any adult intervention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My blood is truly boiling at the sheer carelessness on display.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire setup just makes me so mad.
segments.speaker: PAR
